title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Skills: Strategies to Enhance Multicultural Learners' Online Engagement

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Analyze at least three organizational, technological, and pedagogical elements to support multicultural learners' adaptation to online learning environments.
Explain at least two impacts of cultural differences on online learning participation.
Propose three strategies to address cultural communication barriers among peer learners.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
